title: Inquire About a Lapsed Life Insurance Policy
description: A customer calls after receiving a notice that their life insurance policy has lapsed due to non-payment.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and confirm the lapsed status of their policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy and confirms it lapsed 15 days ago.

tasks.description: Explain the policy's reinstatement provision, including the timeframe and requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the customer is within the 30-day grace period and can reinstate by paying the overdue premium.

tasks.description: Process the back-payment to reinstate the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes the payment and successfully reinstates the policy.
